input.sentences: a huge crowd gathered in support of the event !
we marveled at the massive march !
the locals came out to show support for the initiative !
the big chicken entertained us for a bit as it was comical just to look at !
the whole family came out to rally together in support of the event !
output.sentences: A huge group gathered to support the family.
In all of their massiveness, outsiders marveled as the group marched by.
Every single one of the locals came out to support the initiative for the family.
The crowd that had gathered were entertained by a comical chicken in the street.
It really was picturesque to see the rally that supported the family.
